messages.content: Task: You are a text game player, your goal is to put things in their proper locations and improve your score. You can only perform one action at a time.

Current environment: -= Pantry =-Look at you, bigshot, walking into a pantry like it isn't some huge deal. You begin looking for stuff.You make out a folding chair. You see a yellow onion, some peanut oil, some sugar, some salt and some black pepper on the folding chair. You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a shelf. Now why would someone leave that there? The shelf is wooden. But the thing is empty.
